mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Letter from Charles Peters on Investigating Private Institutions

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A letter sent to Robert Casey from Charles Peters regarding the possibilities and logistics of investigating private institutions that provide services for individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities like the Allegheny Valley School and the Laurel House in Pittsburgh and Fayette County respectively.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
